ART UPDATE

You are going to update the ART (Atheros Radio Test) data on the device.
Please choose the file to upload then click the Update ART button.

WARNINGS
  • Do not power off the device during update.
  • If everything goes well, the device will restart.
  • There are no restrictions on uploaded files, so ensure the ART image is valid for your device.
You can find more information about this project on GitHub.
